description: Set this to the desired width of the "page" element, div.viewport. Will be inserted as the widest breakpoint for the responsive mixin. This variable is overridden in px-theme.
Set this to the desired value of widest possible viewport width. Will be inserted as the widest breakpoint for the responsive mixin. This variable is overridden in px-theme.
Set this to the desired value of margin-left and margin-right for viewport. This variable is overridden in px-theme.
type: Number [default] - Left and Right margin on viewport

description: List of breakpoints used within this module.

context.name: breakpoints
context.value:
(
    "palm"          "screen and (max-width: 47.9rem)",
    "lap"           "screen and (min-width: 48rem) and (max-width: 63.9rem)",
    "lap-and-up"    "screen and (min-width: 48rem)",
    "portable"      "screen and (max-width: 63.9rem)",
    "desk"          "screen and (min-width: 63.9rem)",
    "desk-wide"     "screen and (min-width: #{$desk-wide-width})",
    "retina"        "(-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi), (min-resolution: 2dppx)"
)

type: List | String - Array of different breakpoints
